short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in a peaceful, natural landscape with the Serene Green River Background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transforms your browser's background into a soothing image of a tranquil river under a lush green canopy. A stone bridge, covered in gentle vines, arches gracefully over the calm waters, reflecting the serenity of the surrounding forest. The soft greens and deep blues provide a calming atmosphere, perfect for reducing visual clutter while maintaining focus. Additionally, the extension features a weather forecast icon in the corner of the new tab, allowing you to quickly check the weather while enjoying the peaceful scenery. Ideal for nature lovers and those seeking a moment of calm in their daily browsing experience. Please note that this extension may include affiliate links.
